website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a gentler massage pillow, but putting too much pressure on it could cause it to break.
pros: Adjustable straps to hold pillow in place
cons: Not as durable as some of the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Updated to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! But makes a REALLY loud noise when it switches directions. ******** UPDATE ******** Received an extremely quick response from the company who insisted they replace it. Within 2 days I received a new massager at no additional cost (and they didn't want the old one back) and this new one is AWESOME!! Super quiet 😉 I also love how quick they were to fix the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased when I got this and used it twice for about 20 minutes each time. I stored it in the box in my closet and now when I took it out to use it, it won't work. I plug it in and try to turn it on and nothing happens. So basically a big waste of money because we are 30 days outside the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After looking through similar, more expensive massagers, although still a little skeptical, I chose this one from reading the reviews. The reviews weren’t wrong. This little thing is AWESOME! For being the size that it is, I wasn’t expecting it to be overly powerful, nor give off enough heat to make a difference. Boy was I wrong!! Very highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: DSM1305

customer_reviews.title: Go back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: Jessica Sorry to say but I returned your product. I found it useless. Each time I would lean back and put the least amount of pressure on the unit it would stop operating ? The balls protrude too much and the Velcro strap is only suitable for an old rocking chair I have in the basement . You seem to be a very nice person and I am sorry but that was my experience. I was influenced to purchase the product in reading a number of reviews. I must say I am shocked if those are actual responses.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations after seeing all the reviews. Unfortunately it turned out to be a bad purchase. It arrived on time, as described but the massager only lasted a few days. The motor started to act strange, come to abrupt stops. The motor seemed to lose torque gradually and started making noises as if it was going to die the next minute. So all in all, it was a disappointment and I returned this for a refund as I write this review.
customer_reviews.author: trusira

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this massager, but since the reviews were so good I did. I bought it for my husband & he absolutely loves it! It's nothing like other massagers of this type that we've tried in the past. He uses it almost every night & says it really helps with those tight, sore muscles from working long, hard days. I have also used it & it "hurts so good"! Seriously, it can be painful when you have sore muscles, but it helps so much. The customer service from this company is outstanding, which is so refreshing! I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: The Good Stuff Right Here
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for my daughter, and one for myself. We got them for Christmas, and before I even had a chance to use it, my dad tried it out when he stopped by for the holidays. He loved it! So much, I gave my mom the link so she could get him one! It's a great little device, with enough variation to get all of your sore back spots. I use it for my neck and all areas of my back. The only drawback is the cord, but it's not really that big a deal. Overall, it's a terrific device to help with your sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Mapstone

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this for regular use!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is the best! My job requires both physical and computer work, and my back, shoulders, and neck are always tight as a result. My muscles usually end up burning by the end of a shift. I've been using this massager for 20 minutes when I get home each day, and my chiropractor says my back and neck are the loosest they've been since I started seeing her. I've even been able to cut back to one chiropractic visit a month and only get occasional tension headaches as long as I use the shiatsu massager regularly. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Louella

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if this was going to work as well some have said. I have to say that this works wonders. I initially bought it to use for my feet, I have plantar fascia. The rollers are just wide enough to put your foot right in between those rollers. The different size rollers really help out and give that deep tissue massage "feel." The unit also has a small heating element behind it to add just the right amount of heat to go along with the massage. I really can't express how much this unit works.
customer_reviews.author: TooLowSub

customer_reviews.title: Took care of a debilitating knot...
customer_reviews.text: Best $35 I've ever spent. I had a tension pull on my right shoulder blade that was literally debilitating. It woke me up at night on many occasions. No idea how it happened. After my wife's hands started to fall off from repeated rub down requests, she got this for me. After about 4 painful uses (the pain was a good hurt, if you know what I mean), the knot loosened and I was back to normal again. Very natural "rub" feel, gets in those deep spots, not just superficially, and the heating element is a plus. We now take turns using this as normal maintenance while watching TV. Fantastic device, worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful; hard to use comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful massager, and with the heat function feels good when properly positioned on my recently strained back. The problem is that the 'fingers' are hard and ungiving, with your only control over the pressure being how hard you lean back against it. This can make it very difficult/awkward to use comfortably. Even once positioned right, you can't really relax when using it as if you try leaning back into it, this can quickly go from deep massage to potentially bruising. All in all,.this isn't the product for me and will be going back in favor of a more expensive seat-cover style one.
customer_reviews.author: Digicrat

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The 4 nodes on each side are all different sizes, which I really like. The heat is warm, but not too hot. Just enough to relax you. Works great on your neck, back, legs, feet, anywhere really.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It was my favorite until it died
customer_reviews.text: The primary reason for the low stars is that it died within a few weeks of use. My only other complaint is that it had no setting to stop the rotation from periodically reversing, which is VERY annoying and sometimes painful. The reason it was my favorite, in spite of this, is that the nobs are longer than on other message pillows, so they go deep in the shoulders and they reach around the sides of the neck, which is where I need a lot of relief. They also reach into the small of the back, where others don't quite go. I do miss it, but I'm going to look for something else to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: SeekinTruth

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to position. The strap provided to hold the unit on a chair is totally useless. IF you can find a dining chair with a high straight back, the strap will almost hold the unit long enough for you to sit down... but not quite. Don’t even think about trying to use the strap with a desk chair or recliner. If you can find a way to keep this thing in position, the massage balls are very hard and much different in size so this can at best be described as aggressive. It feels like someone is giving you a massage using their elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item yesterday afternoon. My wife was using it on her back for about 5 minutes before it quit working last night. Absolute garbage. I will be returning this product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Moderation when you begin use
customer_reviews.text: My first application/use was the full recommended maximum of 20 minutes. From now on I will limit to 10 minutes. It does a nice job, but your body needs to be properly eased into shiatsu or you will be pretty sore. I do like the treatment though.
customer_reviews.author: Show Me Rick

customer_reviews.title: You NEED This!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from lower back discomfort and a stiff neck from working at a desk all day. This product is fabulous! It takes a minute to adjust your body to the sensation (at least it did for me) but a week in and I'm feeling great. I loved it so much that I even bought one for my father, who has the same back pains. The heat setting feels so good, and the whole product is solid and not cheaply made. It even comes with a little cloth dust cover. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose Massager
customer_reviews.text: Much needed Massager. SO far so good. I like it because I can use it not only on my neck. I can use it on on feet, calfs, legs, back. It is multipurpose massager! I feel so good!
customer_reviews.author: GOD IS IN CONTROL

customer_reviews.title: This was just THE best purchase I could have made
customer_reviews.text: Where has this magical thing been all of my life. This was just THE best purchase I could have made. I'm a teacher and get chronic neck and shoulder pain and use this as a preventative. The shiatsu digs deep so it may hurt a little at first but it's the same as if you were getting an expensive massage. Let it do it's magic. In fact, I was so happy with it that I used it for about 2 hours straight the first day and the next day was super soar so I learned my lesson to follow the instructions of the massage and do it gradually for 20 min at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L

customer_reviews.title: Good but didnt last very long
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. Initially I would give it 5 stars.Bought it for my wife because she gets headaches and seemed to help alot. The downside is that it didnt last long especially for how little we used it. A week ago itstarted making a plastic on plastic grinding/ clicking noise when turned on, essentially it is broken
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Versatility 🥇
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I feel like I have my own Physical Therapist massaging my troubled areas. I love the velcro/elastic belts on the side. Attaches fiemly to the back of the chair and to your body(not ideal, but ot worked for what I needed) I grapped it around my upper back; wore it side ways to massage one shoulder; and wrapped it in my lower body laying down on my stomach to get my buttocks! This is a versatile product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great for its cost and very focused use. Some users will want more functionality of larger units
customer_reviews.text: The first impression is that its good quality and reasonably priced. It cant reach all areas of back in two ways. 1) The rollers cant get closer or farther apart, it runs right along the columns of muscles up and down your spine only and one cant really use it to one side because it then hits the spine. 2) It has to have a good chair behind it and one that can reach all the way up to your neck. Laying on it in any way either breaks it or it simply hurts too much. The cycle of rotation alternation is good, Heat works well. Overall, its a great entry into the automated massage products.
customer_reviews.author: Me in Falmouth

customer_reviews.title: Tenderize your yourself! 🥩
customer_reviews.text: I owned a similar device in the past and loved it. Eventually it broke and I needed a new one. I searched seemingly a hundred different styles and brands hoping to score on a great model that met my needs while staying simplistic and durable. I randomly selected this one and I have made the BEST PURCHASE EVER! Simple, durable, and aesthetically pleasing , this product is the one to choose. Take it from a 40yo bodybuilder/athlete that hasn’t stopped since I started hitting it hard in 95’. Just buy this one bro 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: GunRueMuscle

customer_reviews.title: Good product for Lower back and neck massage
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how big this product is. My primary reason for purchasing this product was to help kneed my back and neck after working on a car (lifting weights) or neck pain because of sleeping in a bad position. This massager helped with both. I have strapped it to a chair and use it to massage my lower back. I also put in on the bed and lay on it to massage my neck. Both ways help. It has different speeds, which are good but I dont use them. Its the slowest speed with helps (faster speeds actually hurt more than help :p
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is AMAZING. I have suffered from upper back/shoulder pain for years and this works well on those areas. I require deep tissue massages and this is a wonderful addition for those times in-between massages. The more you sit back on the massager, the deeper it gets those areas. I have tried the handheld massagers but it's hard to do yourself, not to mention tiring after a short time. This is the product I've needed all along! Great price and completely worth the money. So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: astro92

customer_reviews.title: Vigorous, so not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to loosen my tight back muscles after a stressful day at the office. The pummeling this device hands out is more like a beating by a 400 pound wrestler than a therapeutic massage. I had to put a thick pillow between me and the device to make it tolerable. After a considerable delay in response to my initial review, Etekcity customer service offered to refund half my cost of the massager. A fair, if delayed resolution. This device may be fine for some.
customer_reviews.author: Badger Lady

customer_reviews.title: I've been able to really enjoy this massager
customer_reviews.text: After some maneuvering and manipulation, I've been able to really enjoy this massager. There isn't much to the operation... comes in two speeds, you can reverse the directions of the rollers (but it reverses on it's own after 60 seconds), and the choice to select with our without heat. No other functions or massage types, so it's a very simple massager but effective once you find the right position of the pillow. I like that it turns off after 20 minutes. In my opinion, this massager requires some additional padding or cushion especially when massaging boney areas such as shoulder blades.
customer_reviews.author: AndroidFan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I found the massager uncomfortable with the edge resting on my upper back while it massages my neck. That being said, it wasn’t so uncomfortable that I wouldn’t have kept it if there was a way to adjust how wide apart the massagers were. I don’t think I have an unusually small neck but the neck pressure was only getting the very outside of my neck. I did enjoy the amount of pressure and the actual massage but it just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Black WolfTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking and Buy It
customer_reviews.text: I am so exhilarated I purchased this massager. I developed a painful muscle spasm due to overwhelming stress, this in addition to prayerfulness helped in relieving the spasm. I would recommend this massager to anyone dealing with stress which negatively affects the body and mind and it's healthier and cheaper than drinking and pill-popping. Would buy again and I still use it for head and neck massages to avoid future spasms.
customer_reviews.author: BellaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly twice, then started doing this weird loud clicking thing on one side. After that, the heat function turned off one on side 😩 I was Trying to save a few bucks but I should have gotten a different brand. It’s not even designed comfortably. Eh
customer_reviews.author: Stella Belle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this! It's a life saver after a long ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It's a life saver after a long day at the office. It's also been pure magic for my craps and pains from my lady time of the month. The dual heat and massage are the best. Honestly didn't think I'd enjoy this product as much as I do. My only complaint is that it shuts off after 20 minutes and I have to press the button again, but that's the only down side.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great massage, first one didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 months of proper use. Contacted company and they issued a replacement. I love this! It is a very good refresher. Just wished you could use it longer for 20 minutes at a time. It does not get hot, just slightly warm. Plenty of length on the cord and the cover is nice. Used mainly on neck and upper shoulders and occasionally on the abs.
customer_reviews.author: J's Review

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Awkward
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice product and can serve it's purpose, but I do find it a bit awkward. The strap on the back of the unit does not fit around any of my chairs so it tends to slip down, I literally have to hold the straps out in front of me or hold the unit itself to get a good neck or upper back massage, which I find uncomfortable to do.. If I lean back into it so it stabilizes the unit then the massage can become too intense for me. I haven't decided if I will keep it for this reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best self care purchase in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Amazing massager, they really got it down to a science. The power is impressive. I am an average sized man (carpenter/electrician) and this could definitely push me around with ease. I bought it with a coccyx pillow for a ten year old office chair I use as a living room chair, and it took it from a chair with no remaining seat that was giving me back problems, to a massage parlor that restores me to get back up and keep fighting. Really like that it switches directions so you don’t get tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a workhorse. I use it on my upper arms and shoulders, moving around to accommodate myself wherever I need relief. I wish I could strap it to my shoulder somehow. It really does the job! My son used it for a weekend while visiting on his shoulders too and said it relieved all his pain.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one. I was trying to wait to open this for myself for Christmas but my sore back complained until I opened it. OMG. It worked so well on my back, using the home office chair and it worked out the exact spots I needed. Best massager I've bought in this price range. I broke the blue wand massager after 3 uses by using it. Anyway, I don't know how long this one will last but the quality of the massage is what you body is asking for regarding relief!
customer_reviews.author: SDRootsMan

customer_reviews.title: Be Gentle on your back on this strong machine!
customer_reviews.text: Do not go so hard on this Machine, Use it soft and easy and it will help Back Pain, I think it's a Great Product. Like having a massage anytime the day and free !
customer_reviews.author: Octavio

customer_reviews.title: Take it easy
customer_reviews.text: It felt fantastic the first time I used it but I was pushing too hard and was sore the next day. It has one large, one medium and 2 small "balls" on each side. The big one really digs in but is a bit too large for me (I'm really thin) but I position it so it feels fantastic. Very powerful motor doesn't strain. Heat and vibrate can turn off...but why would you? 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Joe Momma

customer_reviews.title: I like this massager.
customer_reviews.text: This massager works good. The way the massager spins feels good and feels like a good hand done massage. I put it in the area of my back or neck area and lean back on it on the couch rather than strapping it on a chair. Each roller feels like it has (4) knobs with are staggered in size and works well..
customer_reviews.author: **Hawaiian**

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday and used this immediately out of the box. It’s perfect for my neck tension, I do a lot of computer work. This will save me a ton because I won’t have to spend so much on chair massages at work. Don’t over do it when you get it! It felt so good so I used it several times over the course of a few hours. I am SO sore today 🤣! Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari N.

customer_reviews.title: It works really well and you can feel the heater as well.
customer_reviews.text: I am currently having really bad back spasms from a pulled muscle. Nothing I have tried so far is helping. I use this while sitting on the couch, on all portions of my back and necks, and it definitely helps. The instructions say to not to run this massager for more than 20 minutes at a time. But after 10 minutes on this, you are pretty much done for that session anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar 38

customer_reviews.title: On the spot!
customer_reviews.text: For me, Shiatsu massage is the most effective (and most pleasant kind). This unit is planned to be used in our car on trips of any length. When not traveling, it is at the ready, beside my recliner. It seems really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Don't overdoo it.....
customer_reviews.text: Rating 4 because I just got it, can't speak to the longevity. It has 8 massage "nodes", while others only have four, otherwise seems to be the same as other brands. They do offer a free additional 1yr warranty with registration. So far, does everything it says, careful not to lean too hard on it--it can handle it, but the next day, your back may not.
customer_reviews.author: Pygar

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 18 year old son who lifts weight everyday! He absolutely loved it! I used it for a minute as well and we are going to be purchasing the rechargeable one for my husband in his car!! Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Godsend for the student
customer_reviews.text: I’m a full time college student taking six classes that are all research intensive. That means a lot of reading, internet surfing and writing an endless stream of papers. With time, it can take a toll on ones back, but exercise can be hard to make time for once midterms roll around. For those incidents where you are stuck at the desk with a massive deadline looming but back pain distracting you from making meaningful progress, this humble device is a godsend. I have bad sciatica and this has helped tremendously during flare ups. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I've never gone to get a massage in my life,(must be a guy thing) but this massager is awesome! I end up getting a lot of back pain and knots from work and driving all the time. This gets them out easily. I've used this only for a couple days and I'm very impressed. Be forewarned though that the first day after using this your muscles will be pretty sure. This massager definitely doesn't lack power and gets the job done. I wish I got this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i expected
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for a week now and so far happy with the results. Adv is that it has 4 rollers two small and two large and it rotates well in areas that i need on my shoulder and neck tension areas. It is better than the two rollers i had on my previous one. Very low noise.
customer_reviews.author: PU

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I like this, I've used it quite a bit since I got it. I love the pressure and the heat function. It feels soooooo good!! I did experience this shutting off after I used it for awhile. It shut off and wouldn't come back on. The messager had to cool down and it came back on after awhile. This is actually an automatic shut off feature that keeps the unit from overheating!! It shuts off after about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Madison T. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Awesome Results! Skeptical husband no more. :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He LOVES high pressure asian massages at booths like So Relax at the mall but has little time to schedule appointments for them. He's always been skeptical of electric massagers. Enter the Etekcity Shiatsu Massager... He LOVES this massager! It give him the high pressure he likes with the added heat element that nails 5 stars for this product. It even comes with a car adaptor so that you can enjoy a massage on the go! The value you receive for the price is amazing. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JJensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sore backs and the portability??  Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This massager is absolutely amazing. I looked at the reviews and got this thing just for my lower back. The heavy workouts and sleeping on my stomach had put strains on the back, especially during heavy workout days. This thing did the charm. I like how it can easily move up and down your back and the more you lean back, the harder the massage is. I love the auto shutoff, and I still have to try it in the car. It comes w both a plug for the home and for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Patfromchicago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! It is an economical buy. Love the options you have with this. It can be plugged into your cigarette lighter, attached to back of an office chair or we mainly use ours propped up against the back of the couch while watching tv. It gets the kinks out, and the heat on sore muscles feels amazing too. I would recommend this for anyone who is looking to get relief on tired muscles and not drop a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Susy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a few days but extremely happy. For its size a very strong / deep massage. I like the removable sleeve to keep it clean. Planning to get another to keep in the car ***UPDATE*** Very happy with this, it actually is very strong massager for its tiny size. One small caveat the heating element stopped turning on on one side. I already spoke with seller and a new one was sent at no cost to me/ No hassle, took one communication message not many.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: This is ideal for migraineurs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size for my son and the smaller one for me. We both use them daily or every second day. The trick is to compress the nerves that run up the side of the spine. I've had these ablated (burned), cut (rhizotomy), and had an unsuccessful estim implant, but now use pressure on the neck and an ice hat to break migraines. The Etekcity works well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ross-munro

customer_reviews.title: Efficient product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good things come in small packages. It a compact, efficient machine that seems sturdy. The massaging is robust. I've already used it to work out some kinks in my neck and shoulder and it feels pretty good on the feet after a long day. I loaned it to someone who is having issues with the piriformis muscle and the heat and massage is really helping. I may purchase another as a gift because who doesn't need a little stress relief these days?
customer_reviews.author: Jackyrun

customer_reviews.title: Small Package - Large Outcomes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller massager but it is perfect for all over your body. I use it on my forearms and biceps, as well as legs, back and feet. It is small enough that you can move it around to massage different parts of your body easily. It doesn't get very warm but you can feel a little heat. Still a great product and I am happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: CLENicolee

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor design & low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the massager from a massage chair. The design is poor because the actual massager is not padded like it would be on a massage chair. The unit overheats because it is not vented. On the 3rd day it starred making funny grinding sounds - it still works. So why 3 stars and not 1? It does a decent job for $35. I would even buy it again. I'm even using it right now!
customer_reviews.author: Best Cherry Pie

customer_reviews.title: Connection Issues? No longer working day 3
customer_reviews.text: It was a godsend yesterday. My dad gets calf cramps and after using this they were much better yesterday. I have lower back and neck issues so I used it as well and it was amazing. Then the connection issues started. I have to plug it in and unplug it numerous times before it would work. It's also started shutting off after a minute or so of use. It's extremely frustrating.... I'm not sure if it's the power cord or inside the product. It's completely stopped working. And I still haven't been contacted by the seller to try and rectify the issue as of February 3rd, 2017
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gabriela Terrones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a massage therapist who comes home tired and sore at times. I love your massager, it gets into the knots, and since it's more flat, I can lean on it to get into the back, neck, shoulders, arms and legs. How awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S

customer_reviews.title: I saw all the great reviews so I went with this massager and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the great reviews so I went with this massager and I am glad I did. I just got it and I am obsessed! It has the perfect massage technique for my neck and doesn’t hurt! It has warmth too. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good massaging action, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in good condition. Pros: Light, nice length for cord, has two massage (regular and fast) settings, and good for getting tight muscles to loosen up. Cons: For me, I wish the heat function was a bit stronger. Also, if you only like light massages, this may not be for you. It is pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kaffenberger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Massager
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a variety of shiatsu massagers over the past 20+ years, and this is one of the best. I love the fact that it stops and changes direction without my having to do anything. This is one massager I don't want to be without, so when it eventually wears out (and they all do, regardless of the price), I'll get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Mayne

customer_reviews.title: I worked on my neck first - amazing! It worked on my muscles near the vertebrae ...
customer_reviews.text: Having retired from being a Deep Tissue Massage Therapist of 17 years, I purchased this for my Mom because I no longer am up for giving massages. I had to make sure it worked before giving it to her as a Christmas gift, right? I worked on my neck first - amazing! It worked on my muscles near the vertebrae but also reached my scalene muscles (on the sides of my neck). My neck felt softer, and lengthened. I gained a lot of range of motion because of it. And now, I'm sitting with it behind my lower back. Guess what? I'm buying another one right now!
customer_reviews.author: clickdig

customer_reviews.title: Great value & really effective at relieving muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal. I have terrible upper back & neck pain, and this massager really helps me. I try to use it every night before bed or in the mornings, when I'm feeling most stiff. I used to get massages every week, and now I go less frequently since this massager takes care of acute pain. Caveat that I like deep tissue massages, and this massager does the trick. Great that it can fit around any chair (so you don't have to buy a massage chair) and it's so cheap! Good value
customer_reviews.author: Kate Donat

customer_reviews.title: ... Hong Kong to help with my back pain and like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar massager in Hong Kong to help with my back pain and like it very much. When I got back to the U.S. I was looking for one that can be used with 110volts. I found this and was very happy with it and the price was much lower too. Well constructed and looked like would last.
customer_reviews.author: WM in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Hard to lay/lean on. Exerts a bit more pressure than comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Due to how the massage balls are designed its hard to put lean/lay on without it being a bit too uncomfortable. The unequal sized of the rotating balls is the reason for that. My solution is to lay on my side when I use it so my weight isn't on it. I know they're designed to be unequal size but I wish there was an option to switch out prongs/massage balls to a 2 ball equal type rather than a 4 unequal so I can lie on top of it without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best massage for the price. I get massages professionally about once or twice a month. This helps with the tech crunch I get in my shoulders from too much iPad/iphone use. Received it yesterday and using it right now and I cant believe how great it is. I may use it daily and could see myself buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Greatttt product
customer_reviews.text: Your probably like me wondering if this works and if it is worth the price. My mom originally had pain in her knees and lower back. I bought this for her and must say she loves it. It helps relieves her arthritis in her knees and must say after seeing how she feels with it I am thinking of buying one for myself. Great product and definitely worth the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Ahamawy

customer_reviews.title: It does massage in the way it should to take awsy pain
customer_reviews.text: My neck causes a lot of headaches and i have lower back pain from time to time. I purchased thisto help with both issues but all this did was make both pains worse. My neck is really bad now i can hardky turn my head and lower back is so sore I was thinkng about taking off from work.. The massage rollers are way to hard. I followed instructions) on what not to do as well..
customer_reviews.author: Trailbilly

customer_reviews.title: It does a nice job relaxing and losing up the muscles.
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as expected. There are times I want to just run it for hours, however we know that’s not a good idea. It is easy to operate and is versital to massage many parts of the body by positioning as needed. Time will tell if the massager will last. The only negative is we wish the power cord was about 2ft longer.
customer_reviews.author: Father Knows Best

customer_reviews.title: It felt so good during use
customer_reviews.text: Followed first time 20 minute use limit on neck and upper shoulder region which had tense muscles. It felt so good during use; much like the hands of a human massage therapist. Perhaps I should have done less than 20 minutes because three days later my thoracic spine area still hurts from the treatment. My wife has not used it yet so have warned her to use shorter period initially.
customer_reviews.author: Deer Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but too strong
customer_reviews.text: I am 81 years old with delicate skin, so this product was too forceful for me even with a towel between me and it. I will have to return it and choose something more gentle. Sorry. Please send instructions on how and where to return. Do you then credit my Mastercard?
customer_reviews.author: Carol HEIMBACH

customer_reviews.title: Great massager!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my back. It is a really good massager and helps with soothing my back pain. I also use it to massage my neck which works great. The only problem I have is that the strap is not long enough to go around the chair, so I have to hold it in place. Otherwise, it is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie40

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a lot better than I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lot better than I expected it to be. I purchased it for my brother for his birthday because he loves massages, and he said he uses it every day. On his neck, back, feet..he said it works for everywhere. It DOES need to be plugged in to work FYI but the cord is pretty long. Also he said he doesnt really feel the heat. Still worth the price, and would buy another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: sore muscle relief
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised. I bought one for my daughter and myself. We are both very active and suffer from sore muscles. We both have really enjoyed the massager. I have only had it a month but so far so good in terms of holding up and I do not see any flaws that would led me to believe it was not going to last.
customer_reviews.author: spike

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this has been a game changer!! I bought this for my husband who had a bit of neck discomfort and have upper trap knots. This has helped him get rid of some of his knots and helps him relax his neck. Most definetly worth your money, I use it as well and it has the right amount of pressure for your neck, upper back or lumbaric. This is a great way to get a massage without spending to much $$$$ each time you want to get a massage. Although, massages are great but this is a quick at home massage. We use it as needed, and would definitely recommend to everyone. Always use in moderation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I use it for my neck, back my foot, thighs and also shoulder. I just put up my arms otherwise it grinding right on my shoulder blades. This hasn’t given me bruised at al. I don’t press it on too much. Best purchase ever !!
customer_reviews.author: Nam

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day and fall asleep using it
customer_reviews.text: I get leg cramps commonly and have sciatica and lower back pain. This device works for all of them. When I got to sleep my calves always hurt so I fall asleep using this. Throughout the day I use it on my back to relieve pressure. The heat works great as well. The 15 minute timer that is automatic is great too. If you have these issues and want the feeling of a massage without going to the spa this is key
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expected. The heating function isn't noticeable. By the time it heats up, your muscles will be releasing too much heat to notice. It feels great from the top of my neck all the way to my shoulder blades. I have very wide shoulders and anything below the shoulder blades bruised my back, I wouldn't say that seems like it would be typical from someone smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bolda

customer_reviews.title: This was the best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I ever made, and trust me, I'm a big amazon fan. Just dont hesitate, GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Agustina

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because (like an idiot) I was a little overzealous shoveling 15” of very heavy snow. I could barely move for two days. My lower back has been killing me. This was just delivered today and just what I needed. I’m still figuring out each setting, but right now, the one I have it on does this kneading for a minute or so and then stretches the muscle for 5 seconds. I can’t believe how inexpensive this is and why I didn’t buy one sooner
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: $0.25 per hour
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good while it lasted. I got around 14 months of use 2-3 times a week. The heat features still works, however the drive motor decided to give up. Approximately 60 weeks, 2.5x per week, 30 minutes per use, 75 hours of Shiatsu Pillow costs about a Quarter.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger's are made for bouncing

customer_reviews.title: ORDER THIS RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. Literally one of the best products I have ever bought. I have horrible trigger points in my upper back and neck and they give me horrible headaches. This massager changed my life. It gets right into the trigger points and you can control it. If you have trigger points that give you headaches or any other pain, GET THIS NOW. The first one I bought the cord stopped working so they sent me A BRAND NEW ONE. love this company and their customer service :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: It really helps!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who struggles with arthritis and fibromyalgia, this is great to have handy! It heats up, and vibrates as it massages! Also the massaging rollers change direction ( outward to inward) every few minutes, and really helps with pain relief. Perfect for travel, as it comes with a car adapter as well. I love it .
customer_reviews.author: joni marie stout

customer_reviews.title: Know you’re getting a deep tissue feeling
customer_reviews.text: The “fingers” on this massager put A LOT of pressure on your muscles which can be painful if they’re sore. Keep in mind that you need to be used to it ok with a deep tissue type feeling. That being said, I love this thing! I hook it to a pillow, lean against it on the couch and let it do its thing. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Heat nor Pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for product like one my friend has. His heats up to a therapeutic temp and also provides delightful pressure on the roller balls. This was quite the opposite; not enough heat to provide any kind of relief and the balls stopped rolling when I attempted to lean against them to get more pressure out of the whole thing. Returned asap.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline T.

customer_reviews.title: VERY Effective
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail about 15 minutes ago and I already love it! I got it because I have horrible knots in my lower back and they are already gone thanks to this thing. So far great product! To add to how amazing this massager is, i've had horrible knots UNDER my scapula for the last week or so and this got them out in no time. If you've ever had those pesky scapula knots you know they don't go easy, but wow!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product due to the great reviews however I plugged it in today and it was not working :( It worked great for the first two days. ....decided to update my review, I was contacted by the company and explained to them what happened and they were so kind to send me a replacement. I haven't had any issues and seems to be working perfectly. It feels great on my back and very much needed after long days at work. Will definitely be purchasing another as a gift for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with Scoliosis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter who recently had spinal fusion surgery for scoliosis. She has suffered from back pain for many years now. This is an item that she loves. She has had it now for almost 3 months and uses it daily. Very much worth seeing the smile on her face.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Original, one star review: Too stiff, it hurts. Updated: Etekcity reached out to me and appologized for the bad experience. They sent me an upgraded version of this massager and it is much less aggressive, it has multi uses, and is rechargeable. I like it a lot, so I’m updating my review based on the new product, and the fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Acord

customer_reviews.title: Won't find better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my mom for christmas and I ended up buying one for myself also! Awesome massager for the price. I wish the heat worked a bit more because it only barely gets warm. Still way better than rolling my back out on a tennis ball like I used to do
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Got as a present for my man, because he's always wanting hand massages on his back the product work great it will leave you soar as it gets in there only has like two settings and heat but for the price I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Themantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice...great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great comes in handy works as advertised. The reason for the 4 is because its hard to keep it stable when using it, suggestion to manufactures would be to design a strap to help keep it stable when sitting and possibly adjustable so it can be placed at the lower, mid, or upper back and neck without having to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Great until it died
customer_reviews.text: This thing was exactly what we were looking for while it lasted. After about 5 months of once a week use the wires on the inside got disconnected and it stopped working. I opened it up and soldered them back together and it lasted another two months then had the same problem with the thin wires breaking. Wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Scandaljoe

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I just tried my massager I don't want to get up. This is the Best ever from a long day at work. I don't recommend putting it in the car this will have you Mesmerize LOL. This is GREAT, AWESOME, FANTASTIC all of the above *****. I had to add to my review I've order 4 more for family and friends they ALL LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Te Te

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great. I started using it and 3 days later ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. I started using it and 3 days later I felt 100% better. I now use it once a week just to continue having no pain. The only issue I had was leaning back on it when sitting. The massage balls where hard on my back. I had to sit forward to use it. I was hoping to watch TV while using it. I couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Fear less

customer_reviews.title: Etekcity personal massaging machine
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife since she had tried it out when we were at a Sam’s Club the other day, and since I found it on Amazon for less than what it was being sold in Sams for, and I was able to get it by Valentines Day, it was well worth the investment as my wife has been using it every night and it’s giving my hands a break from massaging her, which I don’t mind, but needless to say, she loves it (the massaging Etekcity massager).
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Reece

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really been enjoying this massager. It does take a few minutes for the heat to kick in but when it does, it’s heavenly. You must watch the pressure you apply because if you lean onto it or apply too much pressure, you will feel sore the next day. Aside from that, I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Crystelle

customer_reviews.title: Portable massage
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! My back, neck and shoulders feel so much better after using this shiatsu. I love that it’s so portable. My daughter tried it and she immediately ordered one for herself. Awesome customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was so tired of me asking every day for a back rub. I hold my stress in my shoulders. This is soooo nice! The heat and the massaging heads that change direction. I did lean on it for like 3 hour the first day and my back hurt sooo bad lol but that’s my fault moderation is key
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for anyone with sore muscles. I've tried others that were so thick they were uncomfortable. This fits behind neck, back, legs, all comfortably, and the heat and message action provides quick relief for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Snead

product_meta.title: Etekcity Back Neck Massager with Heat Function & Adjustable Intensity, Deep Tissue Shiatsu Massage Pillow for Muscles Pain Relief Relaxation, Ideal Gifts & 2-Year Warranty
product_meta.description: Back massager for Chair Car Home Office
feature_bullets: RELIEVE SORE MUSCLES & PAINS: 8 Powerful 3-Dimension Deep-Kneading Shiatsu Massage nodes can relax and relieve pains on your neck, upper back, lower back, shoulders, waist, tights, calves, foot, legs and arms, helping you release stress, relieve sore and tight muscles and get relief on your whole body

ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS: 2 adjustable speeds can be chosen, which allows you to get the right and appropriate amount of pressure to relieve your muscle pain. Equipped with heat & no-heat setting, warm heating helps more to loosen up your muscles (Note: you may place a towel between you and the massager to get softer massage, when you still feel too strong intensity at the slow speed)

2 MASSAGE DIRECTIONS: With built in Bi-directional movement control to mimic the motion of in-person massage experience, the shiatsu massager will auto-reverse every minute for better distribution of massage effects and to provide thorough treatment

SAFETY PROTECTION: The Etekcity Massager settled within 20 minutes over-heating auto-shut off protection, comes with a UL approved AC adapter can work in both 110V & 220V and a DC adapter for the car. Portable design is to ensure you can have a relax massage at home, office, even in the car. It also comes with a high-elastic shoulder strap with 3 Velcro Suitable for most chairs

PERFECT GIFT CHOICE: A relaxation gifts for dad, mom, women, men, wife, husband and all of your loved ones; it makes the perfect gift for any holiday, birthday, Christmas, anniversary, Father's day, Mother's Day or other special occasions

2-YEAR WARRANTY FOR FREE: We offer an extended 90-day money back guarantee, also 1-year warranty (with the option to extend it by 1 extra year for free). If anything happens to your device within the 2 year warranty period, our team in Southern California will send you a replacement model at no cost to you. Etekcity Customer Support Team will stand behind every massage we sold
